name: end-to-end
description: Dependencies for running tests with webdriverio and browserstack

scripts.test-webdriver-manager-local: export TEST_TYPE=local && export MANAGER_MAX_INSTANCES=2 && yarn run test-webdriver-manager
scripts.clean-local: rm -rf undefined/ && rm results*.xml && rm customReport*
scripts.clear: rm -rf remote/screenshots/screen/; rm -rf remote/screenshots/error/; rm -rf remote/screenshots/diff/; rm -rf remote/screenshots/junit/; rm -rf local/screenshots/screen/; rm -rf local/screenshots/diff/; rm -rf local/screenshots/error/; rm -rf local/screenshots/junit/;
